title: 3 Lessons To Raise Self-Esteem - eBook
description:
Do you lack self-esteem? If your answer is yes, know that it is an easy problem to fix. 

In the past, I was really shy and intimidated by a lot of things. This problem was going to ruin my life completely. I had no friends, no girlfriend and it didn't help with my business degree either. So, one day I decided that it was time to change! 
From that moment, I started experimenting and doing things that bothered me, like talking to girls... It was hard, but with time the progress I made started showing up. 

Now, I am a self-made entrepreneur, I earn a high two-digit salary (each month), I have a beautiful fiancee and I reconnected with my family. A month ago, I was wondering what the next step for me would be. And then it hit me! I am going to help people that are in the same situation I was. So, I crafted this self help book for you. If you follow it until the end, you'll become the person you've always wanted to be in a couple of month, or even less. As a good comparison, it took me a year to make this change in my life. 

So, if your answer was yes, this book is for you!


And you can buy it here



Author: J. Zanet
Length: 23 pages
